title: Process an Employee Transfer
description: An employee is transferring to a new role in a different department.

tasks.description: Receive the approved transfer details (new role, department, manager, effective date).
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP receives all necessary information for the transfer.

tasks.description: Update the employee's record in the HRIS with the new position details.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP successfully updates the employee's job information.

tasks.description: Generate a transfer confirmation letter for the employee.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP creates and sends a letter confirming the details of the transfer.
